evidence.claim: LifeNome utilizes AWS for cloud hosting and data storage.
The company emphasizes compliance with HIPAA regulations for data protection.
They implement APIs to facilitate data integration between health systems and their platform.
LifeNome supports FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
Data exchange using X12 transaction sets is part of their service offering.

icp.icp_reason: LifeNome's use of X12 and healthcare integration aligns with ICP criteria.
